snippet: A tribute show that is a posthumous solo debut, “The Eye Is Part of the Mind” features nearly 60 drawings by the fabled art historian Leo Steinberg.
abstract: Holland Cotter reviews exhibition The Eye Is Part of the Mind: Drawings From Life and Art by Leo Steinberg at New York Studio School.
lead_paragraph: A tribute show that is a posthumous solo debut, “The Eye Is Part of the Mind” features nearly 60 drawings by the fabled art historian Leo Steinberg.

headline.main: ‘The Eye Is Part of the Mind: Drawings From Life and Art by Leo Steinberg’
headline.print_headline: Leo Steinberg: ‘The Eye Is Part of the Mind: Drawings From Life and Art by Leo Steinberg’
